label: Confirmed cases of Covid-19
description: Confirmed cases include presumptive positive cases and probable cases, in accordance with CDC guidelines as of April 14.
reference: Dong, E., Du, H., & Gardner, L. (2020). An interactive web-based dashboard to track COVID-19 in real time. The Lancet, 20(5), 533–534. https://doi.org/10.1016/S1473-3099(20)30120-1
notes:
- China includes Hong Kong
- Denmark includes Greenland
- France includes overseas territories
- Netherlands includes overseas territories
- United Kingdom includes overseas territories
